revision.text: '''Berries''' can be grown in the [[Farm]] to earn [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. You can trade certain berries for [[Master Ball|Master Balls]], [[Protein]], and other [[Evolution Items]] at [[Berry Master]] shops. The [[Sprayduck]], [[Squirtbottle]], and [[Sprinklotad]] are all Oak Items that speed up or otherwise improve the process of growing berries.
